revised_title: Cosmic-Ray Nuclei Composition and Solar Modulation
tldr: This article discusses the composition and energy spectrum of cosmic-ray nuclei arriving in the vicinity of Earth from interstellar space. It also explores the effects of solar modulation on these particles, including deceleration and changes in their trajectories. The article highlights the importance of understanding cosmic-ray composition and solar modulation to unravel the mysteries of their propagation and origin.
